GRID.name: Today
GRID.where: (trip_cancelled = false) AND (transfer_assignment_id is null) AND (pick_up_date = current_date)

GRID.name: Today Actioned
GRID.where: (trip_cancelled = false) AND (transfer_assignment_id is not null) AND (pick_up_date = current_date)

GRID.name: Tomorrow
GRID.where: (trip_cancelled = false) AND (transfer_assignment_id is null) AND (pick_up_date = current_date + 1)

GRID.name: Tomorrow Actioned
GRID.where: (trip_cancelled = false) AND (transfer_assignment_id is not null) AND (pick_up_date = current_date + 1)

GRID.name: Assigned
GRID.where: (trip_cancelled = false) AND (transfer_assignment_id is not null) AND (completed=false)

GRID.name: Completed Assignments
GRID.where: (completed = true) AND (cancelled = false) AND (passanger_picked = true) AND (passanger_dropped = true)

GRID.name: Passangers With Maps
GRID.where: (trip_cancelled = false) AND (transfer_assignment_id is null) AND (passanger_id is not null)

GRID.name: Pending
GRID.where: (completed = true) AND (cancelled = false) AND (slip_number is null)

GRID.name: Completed
GRID.where: (completed = true) AND (cancelled = false) AND (slip_number is not null)
